scripts.build: rm -rf src/shared && mkdir -p src/shared/schemas && mkdir -p src/shared/types && cp -R ../src/schemas/* src/shared/schemas/ && cp -R ../src/types/* src/shared/types/ && echo "export * from './schemas/index';" > src/shared/index.ts && echo "export * from './types/common';" >> src/shared/index.ts && echo "export * from './utils';" >> src/shared/index.ts && echo "export const createApiResponse = <T>(success: boolean, data?: T, error?: string, message?: string) => ({ success, data, error, message });" > src/shared/utils.ts && echo "export const createErrorResponse = (error: string, message?: string) => createApiResponse(false, undefined, error, message);" >> src/shared/utils.ts && echo "export const createSuccessResponse = <T>(data: T, message?: string) => createApiResponse(true, data, undefined, message);" >> src/shared/utils.ts && tsc
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
